website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a lightweight goose down comforter that is sure to keep its shape over time, this model is worth your consideration.
pros: Available in twin through king sizes
cons: A little “crinkly” sounding at first, until it is fluffed up

customer_reviews.title: No loops to tie duvet cover, barely fluffier than a regular cotton comforter
customer_reviews.text: Warm, cozy, not too noisy, but definitely flatter than I was expecting and DOESN'T HAVE CORNER LOOPS FOR TYING DUVET. This is my first time buying a down comforter and I thought I had found a good one after reading reviews for countless hours, never thought to look for corner loops in the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Aryel

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: This item took a little longer to arrive than planned, but I was happy when I finally got it. It is nice and natural, very warm compared to my previous blanket. It wasn't pure white like shown in the advertising photo and had some light blue dye stains over it, but I don't care about it as much as I fit it into a cover. Overall good.
customer_reviews.author: Daria Huxley

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy and fabulous comforter
customer_reviews.text: Love this down comforter. So soft and cozy. Very fresh fluffy feeling. The design is padded squares which are not very noticeable , you can also cover the comforter with a duvet cover and change the appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Rico

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Great price
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful and fluffing nice, smells funky but that’s the feathers and fabric a little thinner then I’d like but otherwise nice!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend !!!
customer_reviews.text: The best Comforter ive bought in a long time I definitely recommend !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy!
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my son. He loves it. It is light but warm. All stitching has remained intact.
customer_reviews.author: StylesGirl

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The product was nice. Looks good on the bed. Additionally, feels like good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Quality without spending a bunch
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice feather down. I definitely got my money’s worth. Great Quality, plush and soft. So happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Bertini

customer_reviews.title: Warmth
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I got it for twin beds in Oklahoma. Sure, it gets cold in the winter and we do have heat, but it keeps you pretty darn toasty.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Cashel

customer_reviews.title: Smelly
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is nice and fluffy but smells sooooooo bad!!!!! I don’t know what to do with it. I’ve washed it 5x on delicate and a low dry and it still stinks so bad. Like a dead animal.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Panichi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my new goose feather down comforter it is exactly what it is described warm
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Love my comforter
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one and I love it. Soft and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Debra K. Peck

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality so far. Doesn't seem like it was made on the cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Big C.

customer_reviews.title: very cozy
customer_reviews.text: A little thicker than we thought.. but we live in south Florida so.... overall nice purchase.
customer_reviews.author: melissa malo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy
customer_reviews.text: Simply perfect!!! This is everything!! Extremely comfortable and light and fluffy...love it!
customer_reviews.author: denise panucci

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy
customer_reviews.text: The comforter is very comfy and I sleep good with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Korzynski

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Warm but still sleep cool. A little lighter than it'd be ideally but still good.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Munyon

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and warm! Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this comforter for a guest bedroom and I'm very happy with it. It's 100% cotton and quite fluffy. For the price, I think it's a great value. I originally saw the identical product offered for sale online by one of the major department stores (Macy's), but Amazon's price was slightly better and delivery was much faster (1 day). I've only had it in my home for a few days and haven't washed it yet ,so I can't comment on its durability, but it appears to be a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Marie

customer_reviews.title: Warm Comforter
customer_reviews.text: The comforter is very warm, but it's not as fluffy as I had hoped it would be and also it's very noisy throughout the night. When my husband and I move around it sounds as though there's scrunchy paper inside so it makes a crinkling sound. But it's warm and looks nice, but probably not the best down comforter I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Josette Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this down feathers comforter. Very soft and just right size for my king bed. I bought one at Kohls about 6 years ago and that one barely covered my bed but this one is a little bigger and looks great. I just wish they came in different colors. Fast shipping as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a Fair price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice comforter, soft, and light weight. Kind of disappointed that it was made in China but hey I guess I should have asked that question before I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Brown

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious Comforter
customer_reviews.text: This comforter feels luxurious. It makes a nice impression in our guest room.
customer_reviews.author: The Brooklyn Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Flat with no fluff!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this exact Kathy Ireland comforter from Bed Bath and Beyond on two separate occasions and both times it was amazing! Idk what is up with the comforter I received from purchasing on Amazon but it is FLAT. There is no fluff to it at all. I laid it out to set, tried to fluff it but it Seems like it is filled with about half as many feathers as my other two comforters I had purchased from bbb. Get what you want and purchase from somewhere else to make sure you get the real deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say this is light weight, but that is a plus for me. This is so cozy. I was hesitant because of the price, but this exceeded all expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Alison L

customer_reviews.title: There was a blood stain on my comforter
customer_reviews.text: When I put my comforter on my bed, I noticed that there were 2 blood stains on it. Totally gross. I bought this thinking it was brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Fox Thorpe

customer_reviews.title: Disgustingly foul!
customer_reviews.text: Dead bugs all over the cover. Absolutely 0 quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Good price considering the fact it’s goose down!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it says Kathy Ireland! You can’t beat the price it’s white down! I saw this item it made me cry! I left moms there. I want to go home!
customer_reviews.author: BlueMoon

product_meta.title: Kathy Ireland White Feather Goose Down Comforter-All Season Warmth, Full/Queen
product_meta.description: Size:Full/QueenLayer your bed in luxury with a Kathy Ireland White Goose Feather and Goose Down Comforter. Covered in pure cotton and filled with a white down and feather blend, end-to-end box stitching keeps the fill evenly distributed for year-round comfort
feature_bullets: The all-natural blend of small white goose feathers and large white goose down clusters combine to trap heat and provide excellently, “just-right” year-round sleeping comfort.
Brand New Factory Zippered Package Ready for Gifting or Household Use
End-to-end, sewn-thru construction keeps fill from shifting.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars66 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
